data.message: Could you now work on filters of what kind of stuff you don't want showing on your timeline? Like I would LOVE to not see anything political right now. I'm sick of it.  I don't want to unfollow people because some people who post that stuff post other things I want to see, like photos of my family.

replies.message: Thanks for the suggestion, Megan. We're listening to all of the feedback we get from the Facebook community. If you have any suggestions, please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1ptXm78. -Abby
Thanks for the reply! I gave some feedback on there but I doubt this could be implemented before the election ends! :-(
